constituent: guidance, neck, horns, drop, eye, road, glue
heisigStory: When we accept someone's guidance, we permit ourselves to be glued to a certain road or way of doing something, and try to "stick" to it.
koohiiStory1: For guidance on the road-way, glue a GPS unit to your car.
koohiiStory2: Good guidance will help you stay glued to the right path.
myStory: hướng dẫn. lối đi được đo bởi sự hướng dẫn
words:
主導(しゅどう): main leadership
導入(どうにゅう): introduction, bringing in, leading in
導く(みちびく): to be guided, to be shown
誘導(ゆうどう): guidance, leading, induction, introduction, incitement, inducement
指導(しどう): leadership, guidance, coaching
